verbs.description: bedaff (third-person singular simple present bedaffs, present participle bedaffing, simple past bedaffed, past participle bedaffed or bedaft)

entries.meaning: (transitive) To befool; make a fool of.
(transitive, UK dialectal) To confound or stupefy.
